metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9956 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The route manager in FlightGear before 2016.4.4 allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via a crafted Nasal script.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flightgear - 1:2017.2.1+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flightgear package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2017.2.1+dfsg-4').
